forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny to partly cloudy. High 19C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine to start, then a few afternoon clouds. High 66F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy early followed by cloudy skies overnight. Low 8C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies this evening will become overcast overnight. Low 48F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sun and a few passing clouds. High 16C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few passing clouds, otherwise generally sunny. High 62F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly to mostly cloudy. Low 7C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy in the evening with more clouds for later at night. Low 46F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.fcttext: Morning clouds will give way to sunshine for the afternoon. High 62F. SSE winds shifting to WNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 61F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.fcttext: Rain. Low 58F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a half an inch.
